entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
